metadata.synopsis: The monster ape fights his robot replica and falls for a woman (Linda Miller) from a commander's (Rhodes Reason) expedition.
metadata.genre: Action & Adventure/Art House & International/Classics/Horror/Science Fiction & Fantasy

reviews: Colorful, cartoonish fun, with an improved Toho Kong who eventually battles a 'robot Kong' created by evil Dr. Who (Hideyo Amamoto), variously described as 'an Oriental skeleton,' 'an international Judas' and 'a devil who lies like a gutter rat.' Ouch.
Weird and random without being particularly memorable, and it's very difficult to feel even a little bit sad that Toho never bothered trying to get Kong back after this picture.
